short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tab and Window Limit, automatically disable the user to open not more than 10 tabs and 2 window on each browsers.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension is to reduce Google Chrome's memory usage and free up RAM where the user's force to open only 10 tabs and 2 window.

Compatibility: MSEdge  & Chrome Browser

Can also integrate to Windows Server GPO
